name: AWeberEmailMarketing
0:
”Alexa, open aweber”
”Give me a content tip”
”Give me a tip”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: aweber
des:
Looking for quick and easy ways to boost your email list growth and engagement? AWeber has you covered! 

The AWeber skill can give you advice on increasing traffic to your website, writing compelling email content, and convincing those site visitors to sign up for your email list.

Once you've enabled the skill you can ask for tips in a number of different ways.

"Alexa, ask AWeber for a tip" will give you a random email marketing tip.

"Alexa, ask AWeber for a traffic tip" will give you tips on getting more visitors to your site and content.

"Alexa, ask AWeber for a conversion tip" will provide you with tips for getting people who are engaging with your content to opt-in to your email list.

"Alexa, ask AWeber for a content tip" will get you ideas for writing content to get site visitors really interested in you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
